title: WFT star & DMV native Chase Young surprises mom with a brand new car (WATCH)
body: Washington Football Team star Chase Young says his first dream was making it to the NFL.  And his second? Surprising his mom with a brand new set of wheels was next on the list.  He posted the surprise to his Instagram which can be seen below. Young is homegrown and hails from Prince George's County where he graduated from DeMatha Catholic High School in Hyattsville. Young became a dominant force in his rookie season and became captain of the WFT last season ahead of the Seahawks game in week 16.
